title: Bloomberg Markets: Vorhaus on Rovio Outlook Post IPO
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Vorhaus on Rovio Outlook Post IPO
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Michael Vorhaus\u0010President\u0010Magid Advisors\u0010Discussing how Rovio's initial public offering will give the game company more cash to produce and market the next Angry Bird movie themselves, and how the success of that movie will impact their future.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
